title: Have you ever tried drawing with pen and ink? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes..and I found that I have as little talent with pen and ink as I have with any other media. For some reason, when the “arts and crafts” gene was supposed to turn on, mine was out playing in the next block and missed the event. My 4 year old granddaughter can draw stick figures with great precision…mine look like…never mind… Handwriting does improve…not anything else…

I do it all the time actually . I had started doing portraits with shading but to move to a higher level , I started urban sketching with direct pen, fine liners , brush pen and water colours . I use pencil sometimes when the reference is more complicated or has mor lines and details are very closely spaced . Hope this helps!!!
